description: Source file containing unit tests for the AstroTemplate class in the universalinit package. The tests cover template initialization, project setup, parameter validation, file copying, content replacement, and post-processing script execution.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Fixture that creates and cleans up a temporary directory for tests.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture that creates a mock template directory with config and sample files.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Fixture that creates a sample ProjectConfig instance for tests.

methods.name: test_astro_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests that the AstroTemplate's initialization info retrieval works correctly.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies the project is initialized properly, files are copied, and placeholders are replaced.

methods.name: test_parameter_validation(template_dir, temp_dir)
methods.description: Tests validation of parameters during project initialization, both valid and invalid cases.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks that the post-processing script is executed and effects are verified.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures configuration can be loaded correctly from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests that template variables in files are replaced with project information during project setup.
